summary: This is an email forwarding a court order from Judge Alison J. Nathan's chambers granting additional time for supplemental briefing in the case US v. Maxwell. The email expresses relief about the deadline extension.

persons.name: Nathan
persons.context: Judge Nathan's chambers sent an order granting additional time for supplemental briefing in the case US v. Maxwell.

persons.context: Recipient of the email from Judge Nathan's chambers regarding the order in US v. Maxwell.

persons.context: Recipient of the email from Judge Nathan's chambers regarding the order in US v. Maxwell, identified as being with USANYS.

persons.name: Alison J. Nathan

connections.description: Judge Nathan's chambers communicated a court order to attorney Jeff Pagliuca.
Judge Nathan's chambers communicated a court order to attorney Laura Menninger.
Both are counsel involved in the case US v. Maxwell and were recipients of the same court order.

events.title: Court order granting deadline extension
events.description: Judge Alison J. Nathan granted the parties additional time for two sets of supplemental briefing in the case US v. Maxwell.

keyFacts: Judge Alison J. Nathan granted an extension for supplemental briefing in the criminal case US v. Maxwell.
The deadline extension applied to CC statements and EX 52, providing relief to the legal team.
The order was communicated via email from Judge Nathan's chambers to counsel Jeff Pagliuca and Laura Menninger.
The case referenced is 20cr330, indicating it is a 2020 criminal case in the Southern District of New York.
